open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2007_b3
(x : ℕ → ℝ)
(hx0 : x 0 = 1)
(hx : ∀ n : ℕ, x (n + 1) = 3 * (x n) + ⌊(x n) * Real.sqrt 5⌋)
: (x 2007 = putnam_2007_b3_solution) := by
  have h₁ : x 0 = 1 := hx0
  have h₂ : ∀ n : ℕ, x (n + 1) = 3 * x n + ⌊x n * Real.sqrt 5⌋ := fun n ↦ hx n
  have h₃ : x 2007 = putnam_2007_b3_solution := by
    have h₄ : ∀ n : ℕ, x n = putnam_2007_b3_solution := by
      intro n
      induction n with
      | zero =>
        norm_num [putnam_2007_b3_solution, h₁]
      | succ n ih =>
        simp_all [putnam_2007_b3_solution, h₂, Int.floor_eq_iff]
        <;> ring_nf at * <;>
        norm_num at * <;>
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
    simpa using h₄ 2007
  exact h₃
